name: Kingfrom
0:
”Alexa, ask king frome to turn off bedroom light”
”Alexa, ask king frome to turn on bedroom light”
”Alexa, ask king frome to dim bedroom light to fifty percent”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: king frome
des:
We strive to make home smarter and more convenient. 
You can now voice control your home appliances, just simply say: 

On/Off
"Alexa, ask king frome to turn on bedroom light"
"Alexa, ask king frome to turn off bedroom light"

Brightness
"Alexa, ask king frome to dim bedroom light to fifty percent"

Color
"Alexa, ask king frome to set bedroom light to green"

Timer
"Alexa, ask king frome to turn off bedroom light after ten minutes"

Scene
"Alexa, ask king frome to set flash effect for bedroom light"

To get started:
1, You'll need a Kingfrom Light.
2, Set it up to Wi-Fi network(has internet access) by using our Kingfrom APP which can be downloaded at Google Play or Apple Store. 
After that you can start using the skill given that you have already linked your account to it.
